compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\Users\\Linus\\OneDrive\\Dokument\\an.serviceRawFile:
service: anslagstavla-api

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x  # Update this line
  stage: dev
  region: eu-north-1
  environment:
    DYNAMODB_TABLE: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}  # Anvnd det exakta namnet p din manuellt skapade tabell
  iamRoleStatements:
    - Effect: Allow
      Action:
        - dynamodb:DeleteItem
      Resource: "arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/${self:provider.environment.DYNAMODB_TABLE}"
  iam:
    role: arn:aws:iam::050451406575:role/LambdaDynamoDBUserrole

functions:
  createMessage:
    handler: functions/createMessage.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: messages
          method: post
          cors: true

  getMessages:
    handler: functions/getMessages.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: messages
          method: get
          cors: true

  updateMessage:
    handler: functions/updateMessage.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: messages/{id}
          method: put
          cors: true

  deleteMessage:
    handler: functions/deleteMessage.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: messages/{id}
          method: delete
          cors: true

  getMessagesByUser:
    handler: functions/getMessagesByUser.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: messages/user/{username}
          method: get
          cors: true

resources:
  Resources:
    MessagesDynamoDbTable:
      Type: 'AWS::DynamoDB::Table'
      DeletionPolicy: Retain
      Properties:
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: id
            KeyType: HASH
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.DYNAMODB_TABLE}
